'''Vayuda Turquoise''' are gemstones of varying quality used in the [[Characters#Ascensions|ascension]] of [[character]]s.

Vayuda Turquoise is associated with the [[Anemo]] element.

==Full Description==
"Still, the winds change direction."<br />
"Someday, they will blow towards a brighter future..."<br />
"Take my blessings and live leisurely from this day onward."

==Trivia==
*The item descriptions are narrated by [[Barbatos]].<ref>{{Ref/Quest|A Long Shot}}</ref>

===Etymology===
*The English name for this item derives "Vayuda" from {{w|Vayu}}, a primary Hindu deity who is the lord of winds.
*In the Chinese version, Vayuda is instead called {{Lang|mini=1|zh=自在|zh_rm=zìzai|zh_tl=free, unrestrained}}, which is possibly also a reference to the Chinese name for the concept of {{w|Ishvara}} in Buddhism and Hinduism.
